nodes.text: Battle of unidentified planet  (Kenobi and Skywalker)
A battle between the Confederacy of Independent Systems and the Galactic Republic took place on a planet during the early months of the Clone Wars.

Some months after the Battle of Geonosis in 22 BBY, Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and his Padawan, Anakin Skywalker, fought against the Confederacy of Independent Systems on a planet. The Republic fought against the many super battle droids on the world.
The battle first appeared in the first chapter of the Star Wars: Clone Wars television series. To date, the battle, and even the planet the battle takes place on, are yet to be revealed.
